subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Heston was an unheralded prospect, a stopgap starter and, until Tuesday, the owner of an unremarkable 14-game big league career. But only three hit batters kept him from a perfect game.
snippet: Heston was an unheralded prospect, a stopgap starter and, until Tuesday, the owner of an unremarkable 14-game big league career. But only three hit batters kept him from a perfect game.
